to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
to wipe
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man
to paint/to smear/to apply (makeup etc)/to doodle/to erase/to obliterate
to discredit/to defame/to smear sb's name/to bring shame upon (oneself or one's family etc)/to blacken (e.g. commando's face for camouflage)/to black out or obliterate (e.g. censored words)
to erase/to cover traces/to obliterate evidence/to expunge/to blot out/to suppress
cleaning rag/also pr. [mo3 bu4]
old feminine garment, covering chest and abdomen
to apply makeup conspicuously (idiom)/dressed to the nines and wearing makeup

lit. going round the curves and skirting the corners (idiom)/fig. to speak in a roundabout way/to equivocate/to beat about the bush
to plaster/to render (a wall)/(fig.) to bring shame on/also pr. [mo4 hui1]

in light or heavy makeup (idiom)

sentences.english: Time had wiped her image from my memory.
sentences.chinese: 時間把她的形象從我的記憶中抹去了。

sentences.english: What can we do to make those cheese spread lighter and creamier , also low in fat?
sentences.chinese: 怎樣纔可以做出低脂又美味的起司抹醬呢？

sentences.english: They powdered it to prevent further harm.
sentences.chinese: 他們給它抹上粉，防止進一步破壞。

sentences.english: Top remaining slices with the pesto.
Spackled some butter over my whole-grain bread.
sentences.chinese: 在我的全麥麪包上抹了些許黃油。

sentences.english: Those who in quarrels interpose must often wipe a bloody nose.
sentences.chinese: 那些吵架的調停者必須時常抹鼻血。

sentences.english: Look, here comes a mutton chop with lots of gravy smeared on top.
sentences.chinese: 看哪，這是一個上面抹了很多肉醬的羊排。

sentences.english: Rinse the prawns thoroughly, devein, wipe to dry, set aside.
sentences.chinese: 花蝦洗淨，挑腸，抹乾備用。

sentences.english: Turn the dough out into a lightly oiled bowl. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or a damp towel.
sentences.chinese: 放到一個抹了薄油的盆裏，改上保鮮膜或溼毛巾。

sentences.english: Signs, mile markers, trees zip past my unmoving form.
sentences.chinese: 跡象，英里標記，樹木，快速抹去我那靜止的形狀。

sentences.english: Whiting darkness, destroying a tearing, next to make more mature stating.
sentences.chinese: 唰白此黑暗，抹去此淚水，再次，走著更廣闊。

sentences.english: She dusted every bit of dirt off her dining table.
sentences.chinese: 她將她的餐桌抹拭得一塵不染。

sentences.english: Maccha However, when you drink coffee, you will believe that they can be compatible.
sentences.chinese: 然而當你喝過抹茶咖啡之後，你會相信它們可以相容。

sentences.english: Mortar used for enhancing the cohesiveness between insulating layers and rendering rending coating.
sentences.chinese: 用於增強保溫層與抹面層之間粘結性的砂漿。

sentences.english: For larger calibers, mix a pasteof equal parts starch and salt.
sentences.chinese: 彈孔再大的話，就用等量的澱粉和鹽和成糊往上抹。
